Title: Laal Rang
Writer: Syed Ahmad Afzal (story,  screenplay & dialogue), Pankaj Matta (story,  screenplay & dialogue)
Actors: Randeep Hooda, Akshay Oberoi, Rajniesh Duggall, Piaa Bajpai
Plot: Rajesh joins hands with Shankar and starts working with him in blood theft business. Things go wrong when a professional donor dies and police superintendent Gajraj decides to hunt the blood mafia down.
